card.name: Emperor Almicar
card.text: Other creatures you control get +1/+1. When Emperor Almicar enters, if you cast it, look at the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature, Vehicle, or Equipment card with mana value 3 or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Ria, Master Smith
card.text: First strike Whenever Ria attacks, create a token that's a copy of target artifact you control. If you create an Equipment token this way, you may attach it to a creature you control. If you create a Vehicle token this way, you may have it become an artifact creature until end of turn that's tapped and attacking.

card.name: Druno, Marquisian Collector
card.text: If an opponent would create one or more tokens, instead you and that player each create those tokens. If an opponent would draw a card except the first one they draw in each of their draw steps, instead you both draw a card.

card.name: Tell No Tales
card.text: Destroy all artifacts and creatures.

card.name: Marquisian Flagship
card.text: Whenever this Vehicle attacks, return target nonland permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

Almicar's Striker // Back in Action
card.text:
---
Return target nonland permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

card.text: When this creature enters, you may search your library for an artifact card or a card with an Adventure, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.

card.text:
When this creature enters, you may attach target Equipment you control to it.

Create a Weapon token. (It's an Equipment artifact with "Equipped creature gets +1/+1" and equip {2}. Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

card.text: Whenever another creature you control enters, create a Weapon token and attach it to that creature. (It's an Equipment artifact with "Equipped creature gets +1/+1" and equip {2}.)

card.text: Flying Whenever this Vehicle or another artifact you control enters, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token. This ability triggers only once each turn. card.name: Maroon
card.text: Exile target tapped creature. Phase out all Vehicles that creature crewed this turn. (Treat them and anything attached to them as though they don't exist until their controller's next turn.)

card.name: Ironworks Twinblades
card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has double strike. Equip {5}{W}. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each creature you control.

card.name: Davijan, Trenchbound Titan
card.text: Trample, hexproof Davijan enters with ten slumber counters on it and can't attack or block as long as it has a slumber counter on it. Whenever you cast a spell, remove a slumber counter from Davijan. If that spell was a Merfolk, remove two instead. It it was a Kraken, Leviathan, Octopus, or Serpent, remove three instead.

card.name: Saddled Scuttleback
card.text: When this creature enters, you may search your library for a Crab, Fish, Jellyfish, Kraken, Leviathan, Merfolk, Nautilus, Octopus, Otter, Oyster, Pirate, Seal, Serpent, Shark, Shrimp, Sponge, Squid, Starfish, Trilobite, Turtle, Whale, or Island card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.text:

card.text: Landlubbers can't block Pirates. Whenever one or more Pirates you control deals combat damage to a player who controls a Landlubber, draw a card. {1}: Target creature becomes a Landlubber until end of turn.

card.name: Whelming Wave
card.text: Return all creatures to their owners' hands except for Krakens, Leviathans, Octopuses, and Serpents.

card.name: Thalassophobia
card.text: When this enchantment enters, draw a card. Whenever you draw a card, create a tapped 1/1 blue Tentacle creature token. Sacrifice this enchantment and eight Tentacles: Search your library for a Kraken, Leviathan, Octopus, or Serpent creature card and put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
